d9e0cfef-2a51-4b23-9736-958e89aabb4e.description: Certified Aligned Leaders who have completed the Aligned Leader Program have powered up their skills in creating and maintaining alignment on their team and across their organization. A Certified Aligned Leader has the tools to create clarity, commitment, and connection and to courageously work with colleagues to deliver together on their most ambitious goals.
d9e0cfef-2a51-4b23-9736-958e89aabb4e.name: KG Certified Aligned Leader

badge_template_activities.title: A 5-month program that teaches leaders of all levels how to strengthen their skills and increase their influence in order to create the alignment necessary to drive results across an organization.
4.5 hours of Group Sessions
5 hours of focused sessions with a Karrikins Group Alignment Partner
4 hours of self-directed individual work
1 hour team session co-facilitated and tailored with a Karrikins Group Alignment Partner
Advancement of an Alignment Scenario; an existing project, program, strategy, or objective that is leveraged for the duration of the program.

66e20e59-f4ca-4cbe-a689-894687ad2af6.description: An Activation Accelerator certificate earner has learned how to accelerate activation of the Alignment Blueprint by engaging colleagues to deliver differently, together. This individual can understand the Alignment Blueprint, see how they can play a role in activating it, and connect to their own shifts in mindsets and group dynamics that would benefit from the work done by the senior leadership team.
66e20e59-f4ca-4cbe-a689-894687ad2af6.name: KG Activation Accelerator Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: The Activation Accelerator is a 5 month program that takes teams through a process to accelerate the activation of your leadership team's Alignment Blueprint. It is one part practical implementation, one part team engagement, and one part leadership development. The interactive program helps teams have quality conversations about how the Alignment Blueprint can shape their ways of working locally to drive results.
Completed a variety of experiences including a Discovery Assessment and six team sessions as they engaged in supporting the leadership team in brining the Alignment Blueprint to life.
Learned how to move from Agreement into Alignment.
Identified blockers and accelerators of alignment and how to manage them.
Discovered how to get intentional about navigating tradeoffs in the day-to-day.
Prioritized shifts in mindsets, group dynamics, and organizational behaviors that support alignment.

5c2b1523-162c-460a-a22f-61415998adb3.description: Senior Leadership Teams who have completed the Alignment Journey, Karrikins Group’s most intensive and comprehensive engagement, can align across their companies to deliver as a team. Senior Leadership Teams have learned how to deliver results horizontally across the business while continuing to successfully lead vertically within their function or line of business. These teams have committed to new team behaviors to be able to deliver on the most impactful transformations in their firms.
5c2b1523-162c-460a-a22f-61415998adb3.name: KG Alignment Journey Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: The Alignment Journey is a 12 to 18 month engagement focused on building alignment around the ways in which senior leaders come together as a team to deliver on their most ambitious goals and the most impactful transformations in their company.
Completed a variety of experiences including one-on-ones, six executive team sessions, and small group sessions as they worked to move from Agreement to Alignment.
Developed shared clarity of ambitions and defined how to deliver together by addressing misaligned mindsets and group dynamics.
Discovered new ways of working together, noticing and naming tradeoffs and blockers, and driving alignment through dialog.
Created alignment across the leadership team to deliver the full power of their collective capabilities.
Learned how to start with self and create the space for quality conversations.

Articulated the desired collective impact of the Senior Leadership Team and defined a set of Team Commitments, behaviors the team has agreed to in order to build greater alignment and deliver on their strategy.
Measured and optimized the collective Senior Leadership Team's activation of alignment to drive accountability.
Activated the alignment work wider and deeper into the organization, enlisting the next level of leaders to begin practicing alignment with their teams.

fa8811cc-ffd4-4822-b111-abc783695106.description: A Certified HOW Activator understands that while many leadership teams spend a lot of resources defining WHAT they need to do and WHY they do it, they spend almost nothing on HOW they will deliver together. A HOW Activator takes leaders through the Karrikins Alignment Journey to define HOW to deliver together by addressing misalignment. A HOW Activator is able to lead executive teams in creating alignment to deliver the full power of their collective capabilities.
fa8811cc-ffd4-4822-b111-abc783695106.name: KG Certified HOW Activator

badge_template_activities.title: Demonstrated the ability to Create and Hold the Space for the tough conversations that provoke transformation.
Demonstrated the ability to be Disturbingly Direct with positive intent. Shown to be able to be candid about you and what others won't tell you.
Demonstrated the ability to Solve the Avoided. Shown to be able to bring deep business acumen to identify and dig into what many would like to keep buried.
Demonstrated the ability to Compel Collective Achievement. Shown to be able to partner with leadership teams to get the most out of the work.

428791f9-2565-4a60-bd42-7e58bb9d9ee8.description: An Align for Action certificate earner has learned how to bring diverse people together to deliver results. This individual has defined clear ways of working to build alignment across a team, takes ownership of accountability to ensure new habits stick, and knows how to build strong connection and team affinity for shared goals.
428791f9-2565-4a60-bd42-7e58bb9d9ee8.name: KG Align for Action Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the 6-month Align for Action Program™ (A4A) that takes teams through a process to accelerate how they deliver together on ambitious goals. It is one part practical execution, one part organizational therapy, and one part leadership development.
1 Karrikins Alignment Assessment™
6 GEAR-UP Immersion sessions
3 Team accountability sessions
5 Sponsor activation sessions
